name: TinyCore Linux 14
install_guide_markdown:
# TinyCore Linux Installation Guide

TinyCore is typically run from live media (USB or CD) with optional persistent storage.

install_steps.title: Download ISO
install_steps.detail_md: Download TinyCore 14 ISO (22MB) from official website.

install_steps.title: Create Bootable Media
install_steps.detail_md: Write ISO to USB (512MB+) or burn to CD using any ISO tool.

install_steps.title: Boot TinyCore
install_steps.detail_md: Boot from USB/CD, system loads entirely into RAM.

install_steps.title: Configure Network and Locale
install_steps.detail_md: Run tc-config or use setup scripts to configure network and timezone.

install_steps.title: Install Extensions/Packages
install_steps.detail_md: Use tce to search, download, and install needed extensions from online repository.

license: GPL and other open source licenses
privacy_notes: TinyCore is privacy-respecting with full source transparency. No telemetry.
